location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 32: William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Officials at Bussora [Basra] to John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 10 November 1779, William Digges Latouche and George Abraham report on changes in government in Bagdat [Baghdad] and Bussora [Basra]. They state that all is quiet and that the Chief of the Chaub [Bani Ka'ab] has given his word to the Governor, Solimon Aga [SÃ¼leyman Pasha], not to interrupt trade to and from Bussora.
